mapper.sql: storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId", storehouse_id AS "storehouseId",sort AS "sort",note AS "note", sku_id AS "skuId", name AS "name", number AS "number", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", pid AS "pid"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_storehouse_positions where 1 = 1
and storehouse_positions_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehousePositionsId},'%')
and storehouse_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehouseId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and pid = #{paramCondition.pid}

and storehouse_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehouseId},'%')

and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and pid = #{paramCondition.pid}

select
from daoxin_erp_storehouse_positions where 1 = 1 and display = 1

and storehouse_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehouseId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
